subject: App Crash Report
body: Hi, I'm experiencing constant crashes when uploading photos. Samsung Galaxy S21, Android 13, app version 2.1.3. Steps: 1) Open app 2) Click upload 3) Select photo 4) App crashes.

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body: Hello, I love your app! Could you add a true dark mode feature? Would be perfect for night use.

subject: Login Issue - URGENT
body: I CANNOT LOGIN! Keep getting 'Invalid credentials' error. I've tried resetting password twice. Need access NOW!

subject: Calendar Integration
body: I've been using your app for 6 months. Calendar integration with Google Calendar would be incredibly useful.

subject: Data Loss Problem
body: HELP! All my notes from last week disappeared! Sync not working. Pixel 6, Android 13, v2.1.3. Can I recover?

subject: Thank You!
body: Just wanted to say thank you for creating such an amazing app! The new features are fantastic.

subject: Offline Mode Request
body: I travel frequently and often don't have internet. Offline mode would be incredibly helpful.

subject: Performance Issue
body: App has become extremely slow since last update. Takes 30+ seconds to open. iPhone 12 Pro, iOS 17, v2.1.3.

subject: Pricing Concern
body: Your pricing is too high. $9.99/month compared to competitors at $4.99. Might have to switch.

subject: PDF Export Feature
body: I really need PDF export functionality. Currently only CSV which isn't ideal for reports.
